dataset.title: GBIF Occurrence Download 10.15468/dl.dz29x3
dataset.abstract: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Country is Kazakhstan", "TaxonKey is Columba livia J.F.Gmelin, 1789" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 16 records from Birds of Northern Eurasia 18 records from Observation.org, Nature data from around the World 4 records from Birds and Mammals Collections of the Zoological Museum of M.V. Lomonosov Moscow State University 131 records from RU-BIRDS.RU, Birds observations database from Russia and neighboring regions. Zoological Museum of M.V. Lomonosov Moscow State University. 1 records from Vertebrates Collection of the Karaganda Buketov University Museum of Nature 3705 records from EOD â€“ eBird Observation Dataset 45 records from Hatikka.fi observations 1 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Aves 338 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations
